message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to me, I'm extending this opportunity to you for $120. I understand it might be a bit above what you were expecting, but considering its worth, I believe this is a fair offer.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I appreciate you considering my budget. While I'm interested in the product, $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go at the moment.  I'm happy to offer you $105 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. Considering our previous discussion, I am willing to adjust the price to $110. I hope this meets within your budget while still reflecting the value I place on the product.
